Pink Gorilla

"Quality To Beat Your Chest About!"

Kitchens

Whether it's a complete new installation or a makeover, we will transform your kitchen in just a few days. We can cater for all aspects of the fitting process from removal and disposal to plastering, plumbing, tiling, lighting and the expert fitting of units and worktops.
